attributes.background: The vote simply affects our future not the elders who participate in it, we will have to face the consequences more than them. For example, Brexit may not have to happen and all this panic and stress could have been avoided if us youths were allowed to vote. We should choose how to live our lives.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "14/16".

If you would like the voting age reduced to 16 you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235503

You could start a new petition if you would like the voting age reduced to 14. You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
